nodes.text: Grall was a planet located in the Joralla system, a part of the Mektrun sector in the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. Grall occupied the second orbital position around its sun, the red giant–type star Jaska, and had no moons. The planet had a poisonous atmosphere and a temperate climate, and was considered to be commercially worthless.

Grall was first mentioned in Planets of the Galaxy, Volume One, a 1991 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Joralla system, and therefore Grall, in grid square L-17.
